alert.note: Alert for Clay (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 2:03AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Clay and north central Dunklin Counties through 230 AM CST... At 203 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Maynard, or 11 miles northeast of Pocahontas, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Corning, Chalk Bluff Natural Area, Reyno, St. Francis, Pollard, McDougal, Success, Datto, Saint Francis, Heelstring, Hickoria, Twin Oaks, Palatka, Wilhelmina and Chalk Bluff Battlefield Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
